CustomField.description: Enter the list of API names of fields from the Product object made available in the Sorting drop down on the Catalog page. User is allowed to select a field from this list to sort the Catalog page content.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the list of API names of fields from the Product object made available in the Sorting drop down on the Catalog page. User is allowed to select a field from this list to sort the Catalog page content.
CustomField.label: Product Sorting Fields
